description: One of the seven heads of the 88 kiyakou. A youkai whose black feathers make whoever they touch go temporarily blind, her "Genyakou" (Lit: Phantom Night Parade). She faces Yuki Onna but is defeated. She later takes the Maou`s Hammer from Tamazuki and returns it to Mitsume Yazura of the Nura clan, who started this incident.
name: Yosuzume
